actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to restore citizenship to persons who renounced or otherwise lost American nationality because of opposition to American military action in Indochina.

summary.text: Restores United States citizenship, upon petitioning any district court, to any former citizen who lost nationality through action taken solely or partially because of disapproval of or opposition to United States military involvement in Indochina.

titles.title: A bill to restore citizenship to persons who renounced or otherwise lost American nationality because of opposition to American military action in Indochina.
